text: alright guys over here in the Northeast
the cold season is amongst us and I came
up a little drink few years ago to add
as a immune system maintenance kind of
health tonic and you can find it at bone
Appetit Calm it's called be a Brad's
health tonic let's erase that one then
all right first I start the two lines
have them I like to squeeze those in
first just adds a nice liquid base at
the bottom for mixing the rest of the
ingredients I would throw a little chunk
in for good measure I use a little sprig
fresh rosemary
they call it bruising I just give it a
little twist and rub with my finger and
that helps open up the you know the
cells and really some of the natural
oils and the flavor of the herb mint
same with that just a little little
bruising pop that right in and then I
throw tarragon same thing bruised up you
can use any herb really those three I
tend to like the most little super
echinacea
and again these are all just natural
extracts American ginseng what that does
is gives you a little little light of
natural energy it's kind of give you the
same kind of feeling is as caffeine but
without without the crash and then the
last one here is a digestive bitter it's
just the blend of different whole roots
and different flowers and and it's just
a natural extract that I put in there
too and then the last one is the black
elderberry syrup and that already has
some vitamin C in it some echinacea and
it adds a little bit of sweetness too
from the black elderberry some brands
have a little honey in it and a little
apple cider vinegar all those are fine
this one is just straight cranberry
juice 100% natural not a blend it's a
little more expensive but I find it to
be worth it and yeah put a few few
tablespoons of that in and then I'll
just give it a good mix and then you can
either top it off with shelter or
distilled water
I prefer still water but whatever you're
into and that's it what I like to do is
drink half and then fill it up a water
again and just kind of keep it going
until there's not much flavor left so
that's the tonic quick simple and
effective

delicious
